titles.title: A resolution designating Thursday, November 16, 2006, as "Feed America Day".
A resolution designating Thursday, November 16, 2006, as "Feed America Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates Thursday, November 16, 2006, as Feed America Thursday.
Calls upon the people of the United States to sacrifice two meals on Thursday, November 16, 2006, and to donate the money that they would have spent on food to a religious or charitable organization for the purpose of feeding the hungry.
